column1: The appointment of Deloitte & Touche LLP as the Company’s independent registered public accounting firm for the fiscal year ending March 31, 2024 was ratified.
The proposal to approve, on an advisory basis, the compensation of the Company’s named executive officers was approved.
The proposal for shareholders to vote, on an advisory basis, on the frequency of the advisory vote on executive compensation received the following votes.
The shareholder-submitted proposal on ratification of termination pay was not approved.
